sentences.en: He struts around like a rooster in a hen house.
sentences.cn: 他像鸡舍里的公鸡一样大摇大摆走来走去.

sentences.en: Oh , my God , Rooster, what are you doing? They are my flowers!
sentences.cn: 蜜蜂:公鸡, 你在做什么? 它们是我的花朵!

sentences.en: On this day, the centipede out of play, did not expect close to cock it quietly, suddenly discovered the centipede rooster, rapid escape, but was too late.
sentences.cn: 公鸡干着急。这一天，蜈蚣出来玩耍，没想到公鸡悄悄地接近了它，蜈蚣突然发现了公鸡，快速逃跑，可是已经来不及了。

sentences.en: Peter then denied it again, and immediately a rooster crowed.
sentences.cn: 约18:27彼得又不承认.立时鸡就叫了.

sentences.en: That's why I told you to turn right at the big rooster statue.
sentences.cn: 所以我告诉你要在大公鸡雕像向右转.

sentences.en: The characteristic cry of a rooster early in the morning.
sentences.cn: 鸡啼声清晨公鸡特有的鸣叫.

sentences.en: The cock (or rooster) bristled his crest.
The crow of the rooster woke me up.
sentences.cn: 雄鸡的啼叫声把我吵醒了.

sentences.en: The late moon arose before the first rooster crowed.
sentences.cn: 公鸡未啼,下弦月已经挂在天边.

sentences.en: The long crow of rooster split the gray morning sky.
sentences.cn: 一只雄鸡引吮长鸣,惊破了黎明时的苍穹.

sentences.en: The rooster chased me across the dirt floor of the barn.
sentences.cn: 公鸡追着我跑过谷仓的泥土地面。

sentences.en: The rooster clawed a hole in the earth.
sentences.cn: 那只公鸡在地上扒出个洞来.

sentences.en: The rooster flew up to a big rock and began to crow.
sentences.cn: 公鸡飞上大石头，开始鸣叫。

sentences.en: The rooster he paints looks nice, but it is still more than I want to pay.
sentences.cn: 他画的公鸡不错, 但还是比我想出的价钱高.

sentences.en: The Rooster is known to be a very trustworthy person.
sentences.cn: 属鸡的人是非常值得信赖的人.
公鸡的啼叫声把我吵醒了.

trans.tran_cn: 公鸡，[美]狂妄自负的人，好斗者
